metadata.description: Cardiovascular reflex pathways regulating heart rate and vascular tone.
metadata.notes: Captures reflex sequencing while omitting biomimetic hemodynamic parameters.

baroreceptor.stimulus: Arterial stretch changes in carotid sinus and aortic arch.
baroreceptor.afferent: Glossopharyngeal and vagal baroreceptor fibers to nucleus tractus solitarius.
baroreceptor.integration: Medullary cardiovascular centers adjusting sympathetic and parasympathetic output.
baroreceptor.efferent: Vagal efferents to sinoatrial node and sympathetic vasomotor pathways.
baroreceptor.effector: Heart rate decrease with vasodilation to normalize pressure.

bainbridge.stimulus: Atrial stretch from increased venous return.
bainbridge.afferent: Vagal cardiopulmonary receptors to nucleus tractus solitarius.
bainbridge.integration: Medullary circuits reducing vagal tone while increasing sympathetic drive.
bainbridge.efferent: Cardiac sympathetic fibers to sinoatrial node and myocardium.
bainbridge.effector: Acceleration of heart rate and contractility to accommodate volume.

diving.stimulus: Facial immersion in cold water activating trigeminal receptors.
diving.afferent: Trigeminal afferents to brainstem cardiorespiratory centers.
diving.integration: Coordinated output increasing vagal tone and peripheral vasoconstriction.
diving.efferent: Vagal efferents and sympathetic vasoconstrictor fibers.
diving.effector: Bradycardia with systemic vasoconstriction preserving core perfusion.
